title: An\'alisis e implementaci\'on de algoritmos evolutivos para la optimizaci\'on de simulaciones en ingenier\'ia civil. (draft)
abstract: This paper studies the applicability of evolutionary algorithms, particularly, the evolution strategies family to estimation of a degradation parameter (referred as kappa parameter) for the shear design of reinforced concrete beams, a problem which have an expensive computational cost and highly relevant in the design of pillars and reinforced concrete structures, which however, has not been covered extensively in the present literature.
histories: The authors acknowledge corrections, comments and suggestions to this paper
